title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.12 - Name in which horse is run
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.12 - Name in which horse is run

State Regulations

The name in which any horse is run must be the real or
the stable name of the individual owner or the name of the partnership owner
(being its stable name or the name of the individual in whose name the horse is
run) of the entire interest in the horse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
